translations: 使转世，使再生；使转世化身

sentences.sentence: If all happened for highest good, you would not reincarnate.
sentences.translation: 如果一切都在最高的善中发生的话，你就不会轮回转世。

sentences.sentence: Glyph of Renewed Life - All stats increased by 5% for 60 SEC when you Reincarnate.
sentences.translation: 诈尸铭文(哦不是复生)-当你诈尸后所有属性提高5%，持续60秒。
